content: *fun for halloween mardi gras or other costume events this wig is sure to bring out the wild thing in you lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60443 skill level beginner *grape* homespun® article #790 1 ball *espresso* lion® boucle article #930 57 yards *lime* lion® bouclé article #930 57 yards *royal blue* microspun article #910 1 ball *lion® bouclé article #930 has been discontinued * crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm wig base is worked in the round from the top down in microspun homespun and lion bouclé yarn lengths are drawn through the base to make the hair see also 60385 purple braids wig 1 60386 wild wild red wig 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/purple-braids-wig 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wild-wild-red-wig
